titleInfo.title: Letter, J.G.M. Ramsey in Riverside, Tenn., to his children in Charlotte, N.C. 1872 Mar. 3

mods.abstract: J.G.M. Ramsey wrote this letter on March 3, 1872 and addressed it to his children. He mentioned his daughter Sue's improvement from her recent illness. He mentioned that he and his wife would be moving and asked his daughter, Liddy, to advise them where they should move. He told his children about the recent bad winter weather in Knoxville. He mentioned the family should sell some of the household goods to get cash for travel money. He sent instructions for packing and sending their belongings to Knoxville by rail. He told the children that he and their mother were not as well as they had been.
